meanings.sent1: The manager is departmentalizing the company to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The company is departmentalizing its operations to streamline workflow.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke that the magician tried departmentalizing his tricks, but they kept disappearing!
meanings.sent4: She is departmentalizing her thoughts like sorting papers into different folders.
meanings.sent5: The concept of departmentalizing can be compared to organizing a messy room into neat sections.

meanings.definition: To organize or arrange by departments.
meanings.sent1: The supervisor is departmentalizing the tasks for each team member.
meanings.sent2: Departmentalizing the project will help each team focus on specific goals.
meanings.sent3: The chef was departmentalizing the ingredients like a conductor orchestrating a symphony.
meanings.sent4: She felt like departmentalizing her schedule would bring more structure to her day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained departmentalizing as grouping similar items together for better management.
